mapper.update:
update t_cons_cart
goodsId = #{goodsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customerNo = #{customerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goodsSpecifications = #{goodsspecifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ifGroup = #{ifgroup,jdbcType=CHAR},
groupNo = #{groupno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
priceNo = #{priceno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purchaseCurrent = #{purchasecurrent,jdbcType=CHAR},
addCartTimestamp = #{addcarttimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
addTimestamp = #{addtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
addUserKey = #{adduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updTimestamp = #{updtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updUserKey = #{upduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updPgmId = #{updpgmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where no = #{no,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_cons_cart set goodsId = #{goodsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customerNo = #{customerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsSpecifications = #{goodsspecifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ifGroup = #{ifgroup,jdbcType=CHAR}, groupNo = #{groupno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, priceNo = #{priceno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purchaseCurrent = #{purchasecurrent,jdbcType=CHAR}, addCartTimestamp = #{addcarttimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, addTimestamp = #{addtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, addUserKey = #{adduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updTimestamp = #{updtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updUserKey = #{upduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updPgmId = #{updpgmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where no = #{no,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select a.goodsId, b.goodsName, b.goodsThumbnail as goodsImage, a.quantity as goodsQuantity, (case when a.ifGroup = '1' then d.groupPrice else c.goodsClassValue end )* a.quantity as goodsPrice, a.goodsSpecifications as goodsPropertiesDB from t_cons_cart a inner join t_goods b on a.goodsId = b.goodsId inner join t_goods_price c on a.goodsId = c.goodsId inner join t_goods_group d on a.goodsId = d.goodsId where 1 = 1 and a.customerNo = #{customerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.goodsId, b.goodsName, b.goodsThumbnail as goodsImage, a.quantity as goodsQuantity, (case when a.ifGroup = '1' then d.groupPrice else c.goodsClassValue end )* a.quantity as goodsPrice, a.goodsSpecifications as goodsPropertiesDB from t_cons_cart a inner join t_goods b on a.goodsId = b.goodsId inner join t_goods_price c on a.goodsId = c.goodsId inner join t_goods_group d on a.goodsId = d.goodsId where 1 = 1 and a.customerNo = #{customerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.purchaseCurrent = '1'
mapper.delete: delete from t_cons_cart where customerNo = #{customerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and purchaseCurrent = '1'
